ç¤¾å›¢ä¼šä¸å®šæœŸä¸¾è¡Œå¬è½»éŸ³ä¹çš„è½»éŸ³ä¼šï¼ï¼æ¯å‘¨è¿˜ä¼šåˆ†äº«è½»éŸ³ä¹ï¼ Qç¾¤ï¼š983271795

ï¼‚No noise hereâ€š only music and youâ€¤ï¼‚

Welcome to Light Music Club a tranquil haven crafted for weary soulsâ€¤ We believe that true relaxation does not mean escaping the cityâ€š but finding your own rhythm within itâ€¤ Hereâ€š there is no hubbub of voicesâ€š no hurried footstepsonly flowing pure musicâ€š soft lightingâ€š and a group of people who are willing to slow downâ€š including you and meâ€¤ We gather every weekâ€¤ Close your eyes and listen to the murmur of a pianoâ€š the gentle touch of string instrumentsâ€¤ Let the melody wash away restlessnessâ€š and let your breath return to calmâ€¤ Light Music Club is more than just listening to music it is a ritual of reuniting with yourselfâ€¤ If you also want to carve out a peaceful sanctuary for yourself in the gaps of a fast-paced lifeâ€š we will be hereâ€š waiting for youâ€¤ The club will hold light music listening sessions irregularlyÇƒÇƒ We also share light music every weekÇƒ
